title: Save more than $100 on this top-rated data recovery tool

This top-rated data recovery software is on sale now through January 21 for one of the best deals you’ll find.

Just specify the location where you lost your files, choose the drive to scan for lost data, and preview the wizard’s recoverable data findings. Then, select what you want to restore and it will return to a new drive. It’s that simple.

Find out why EaseUS Data Recovery Wizard has earned 4.5/5 stars on TechRadar and 4.1/5 stars on G2. Now through 11:59 pm PT on January 21, you can get a lifetime subscription for 70% off $149 at just $45.97.
